text: Magnum Bonum was a pop group from Huddinge in Sweden, scoring several chart successes in Sweden during the 1970's and 80's.Swedish album chartSwedish singles chart Famous songs are Skateboard (LA Run), Marie, Lover Boy, Vi vill ha mer, HÃ¶g hatt and Digital panik. ==References== ==Other websites== * Officiell webbplats Category:Swedish pop music groups
